page.title: 14RELIGION-FACILITIES
page.content: THERE IS A 13TH. CENTURY PARISH CHURCH WITH A RESIDENT VICAR WHO IS RURAL DEAN OF SOUTH LYMPNE AND HAS CHARGE OF STONE,EBONY AND BROOKLAND.REGULAR SUNDAY SERVICES ARE HELD WIYH ATTENDANCES AVERAGING 20-30 PEOPLE BUT ON HIGH DAYS THE CHURCH CAN BE FULL.A YOUNG CHURCH IS HELD FOR CHILDREN ON THREE SUNDAY MORNINGS IN THE MONTH WITH APPROXIMATELY 12 CHILDREN ATTENDING. REGULAR SUNDAY SERVICES ARE HELD AT THE METHODIST CHAPEL,THE MINISTER RESIDING IN NEW ROMNEY. THE JEHOVAS WITNESS MEET REGULARLY IN A MEMBERS HOUSE.
